page.title: 11SHOPPING
page.content: People who live in the villages in our area have a choice of shopping in either village between the post office and one other store. In Gurney Slade there is a fresh meat butcher who also sells a wide range of general store goods and fresh vegetables from Bristol Market. It is a family firm and also serves the outlying areas with a travelling van. The Post Office is also a general store and paper shop, with a dry cleaning agency. In Oakhill the Post Office sells a range of general household goods, gifts and stationary with an off license. There is also a local food store which is another family concern and provides the newspaper deliveries for the area and has a dry cleaning agency. For other shopping villagers must travel to nearby towns and cities. Many shop outside the village monthly or weekly.
